transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Santosh Kumar ji se baat ho rahi hai Raindrop play equipment mein?
Customer: Nahi cap play equipment.
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Are yaar abhi tak do mahine dedh mahine ho gaya abhi tak 2.5 months ho gaya ek lead bhi nahi generate ho raha hona na yaar.
Executive: Ek second main check kar leta hu.
Customer: Sir product mein competition itna hai ki buyers to scroll hi nahi baat kar raha hai.
Customer: Are yaar ye ek do two and half months ho gaya ek lead to.
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: Yaar chupke paise banna kya yaar.
Executive: Main three.
Customer: Lead diye tabhi nahi diye tabhi main paise banna.
Customer: At least ek lead to aana hi hai na yaar ek lead bhi nahi to kaise yaar.
Executive: Sir aap account holder hai.
Customer: Sir maine CST tester pe bhi apne catalog ko dala hai. Aare session kya baat karne ka.
Executive: Ek second main baat kara raha hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi kaun baat kar raha hai aapka naam Deepak hai.
Executive: Change of product.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not generating leads in the last 2.5 months.

- Feels there is too much competition.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the account.

- Executive is transferring the call to another executive.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, competition
